title: Covid-19 tests at the airport
description:
The travel industry has a plan to get you back in the air. Recode’s Rebecca Heilweil explains why your next Covid test may be at the airport spa. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: Covid-19 tests at the airport
itunes:author: Recode
itunes:subtitle: With the travel industry battered by Covid, airlines are scrambling to sell tickets.
